00014 #include "graphdialogconnector.h"
00015 #include <qpixmap.h>
00016 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00017 #include <qpainter.h>
00018 #include <qtooltip.h>
00019 #include <qtabwidget.h>
00020 #include <qimage.h>
00021 #include <qlayout.h>

00023 #include <qcheckbox.h>
00024 #include "ui_graphdialog.h"
00025 
00026 XQGraphDialogConnector::XQGraphDialogConnector
00027 (const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph, DlgGraphSetup* item) :
00028     XQConnector(graph, item),
00029     m_pItem(item),
00030     m_selPlot(createOrphan<XItemNode<XPlotList, XPlot> >("", true, graph->plots(), true)),
00031     m_selAxis(createOrphan<XItemNode<XAxisList, XAxis> >("", true, graph->axes(), true)),
00032     m_conBackGround(xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00033                     (graph->backGround(), m_pItem->m_clrBackGroundColor)),
00034     m_conDrawLegends(xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00035                      (graph->drawLegends(), m_pItem->m_ckbDrawLegends)),
00036     m_conPersistence(xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>
00037                      (graph->persistence(), m_pItem->m_dblPersistence)),
00038     m_conPlots(xqcon_create<XQListBoxConnector>(m_selPlot, m_pItem->lbPlots)),
00039     m_conAxes(xqcon_create<XQListBoxConnector>(m_selAxis, m_pItem->lbAxes))
00040 {
00041     m_pItem->dblIntensity->setRange(0.0, 2.0, 0.1, true);
00042     m_pItem->m_dblPersistence->setRange(0.0, 1.0, 0.1, true);
00043     
00044     m_lsnAxisChanged = m_selAxis->onValueChanged().connectWeak
00045         (shared_from_this(), &XQGraphDialogConnector::onSelAxisChanged, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00046     m_lsnPlotChanged = m_selPlot->onValueChanged().connectWeak
00047         (shared_from_this(), &XQGraphDialogConnector::onSelPlotChanged, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00048 
00049     m_pItem->show();
00050 }   
00051 XQGraphDialogConnector::~XQGraphDialogConnector() {
00052     if(isItemAlive()) m_pItem->close();
00053 }
00054  
00055 void
00056 XQGraphDialogConnector::onSelAxisChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00057     m_conAutoScale.reset();
00058     m_conLogScale.reset();
00059     m_conDisplayTicLabels.reset();
00060     m_conDisplayMajorTics.reset();
00061     m_conDisplayMinorTics.reset();
00062     m_conAxisMin.reset();
00063     m_conAxisMax.reset();
00064     m_conTicLabelFormat.reset();
00065     shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = *m_selAxis;
00066     if(!axis) {
00067         return;
00068     }
00069     m_conAutoScale = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(
00070         axis->autoScale(), m_pItem->ckbAutoScale);
00071     m_conLogScale = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(
00072         axis->logScale(), m_pItem->ckbLogScale);
00073     m_conDisplayTicLabels = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00074         (axis->displayTicLabels(), m_pItem->ckbDisplayTicLabels);
00075     m_conDisplayMajorTics = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00076         (axis->displayMajorTics(), m_pItem->ckbDisplayMajorTics);
00077     m_conDisplayMinorTics = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00078         (axis->displayMinorTics(), m_pItem->ckbDisplayMinorTics);
00079     m_conAxisMin = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(axis->minValue(), m_pItem->edAxisMin);
00080     m_conAxisMax = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(axis->maxValue(), m_pItem->edAxisMax);
00081     m_conTicLabelFormat = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>
00082         (axis->ticLabelFormat(), m_pItem->edTicLabelFormat);
00083 }
00084 void
00085 XQGraphDialogConnector::onSelPlotChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00086     m_conDrawPoints.reset();
00087     m_conDrawLines.reset();
00088     m_conDrawBars.reset();
00089     m_conDisplayMajorGrids.reset();
00090     m_conDisplayMinorGrids.reset();
00091     m_conMajorGridColor.reset();
00092     m_conMinorGridColor.reset();
00093     m_conPointColor.reset();
00094     m_conLineColor.reset();
00095     m_conBarColor.reset();
00096     m_conMaxCount.reset();
00097     m_conClearPoints.reset();
00098     m_conIntensity.reset();
00099     m_conColorPlot.reset();
00100     m_conColorPlotColorLow.reset();
00101     m_conColorPlotColorHigh.reset();
00102 
00103     shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = *m_selPlot;
00104     if(!plot) {
00105         return;
00106     }
00107     m_conDrawPoints = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00108         (plot->drawPoints(), m_pItem->ckbDrawPoints);
00109     m_conDrawLines = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00110         (plot->drawLines(), m_pItem->ckbDrawLines);
00111     m_conDrawBars = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00112         (plot->drawBars(), m_pItem->ckbDrawBars);
00113     m_conDisplayMajorGrids = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00114         (plot->displayMajorGrid(), m_pItem->ckbDisplayMajorGrids);
00115     m_conDisplayMinorGrids = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00116         (plot->displayMinorGrid(), m_pItem->ckbDisplayMinorGrids);
00117     m_conMajorGridColor = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00118         (plot->majorGridColor(), m_pItem->clrMajorGridColor);
00119     m_conMinorGridColor = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00120         (plot->minorGridColor(), m_pItem->clrMinorGridColor);
00121     m_conPointColor = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00122         (plot->pointColor(), m_pItem->clrPointColor);
00123     m_conLineColor = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00124         (plot->lineColor(), m_pItem->clrLineColor);
00125     m_conBarColor = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00126         (plot->barColor(), m_pItem->clrBarColor);
00127     m_conMaxCount = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>
00128         (plot->maxCount(), m_pItem->edMaxCount);
00129     m_conClearPoints = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>
00130         (plot->clearPoints(), m_pItem->btnClearPoints);
00131     m_conIntensity = xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>
00132         (plot->intensity(), m_pItem->dblIntensity);
00133     m_conColorPlot = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>
00134         (plot->colorPlot(), m_pItem->ckbColorPlot);
00135     m_conColorPlotColorLow = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00136         (plot->colorPlotColorLow(), m_pItem->clrColorPlotLow);
00137     m_conColorPlotColorHigh = xqcon_create<XKColorComboConnector>
00138         (plot->colorPlotColorHigh(), m_pItem->clrColorPlotHigh);
00139 }
